pkgmetadata.longdescription:
JItsi Meet COnference FOcus server (media session manager)
JItsi COnference FOcus is a mandatory server-side focus component used in Jitsi Meet conferences. It is responsible for managing media sessions between each of the participants and the videobridge.
NB: ebuild versioning follows that of the release tarballs and reflects upstream's deb variant; however, please note that the _slot_ for the resulting application jar is 1.1 (not 1.0).
